title: Big Facts feat. Kodak Black
itunes:title: Big Facts feat. Kodak Black
description:
Fresh off the release of his new album “Back For Everything”, Kodak Black sits with the Big Facts posse to discuss the album, LA shooting incident, his come up, incarceration and more!
